TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCacheDependency extends System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCacheDependency Inherits CacheDependency
public ref class SqlCacheDependency sealed : System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency

summary.span: 在存储于 ASP.NET 应用程序的 对象中的项与特定 SQL Server 数据库表或 SQL Server 2005 的查询结果之间建立关系。

span.span: Establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and either a specific SQL Server database table or the results of a SQL Server 2005 query.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所有受支持版本的 SQL Server （Microsoft SQL Server 7.0、 Microsoft SQL Server 2000 中，和 SQL Server 2005）类监视特定的 SQL Server 数据库表。On all supported versions of SQL Server (Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, and SQL Server 2005) the class monitors a specific SQL Server database table. 当表更改，与该表关联的项会从，并且项目的新版本添加到。When the table changes, items associated with the table are removed from the , and a new version of the item is added to the . 类还支持与集成类时使用[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]数据库。The class also supports integration with the class when using a [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] database. 查询通知机制[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]检测到使其无效的 SQL 查询和删除任何缓存中的 SQL 查询，与关联的项的结果的数据更改。The query notification mechanism of [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] detects changes to data that invalidate the results of an SQL query and removes any cached items associated with the SQL query from the . 你可以使用类将项添加到你的应用程序使用时所依赖的 SQL Server 数据库表或 SQL 查询[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]。You can use the class to add items to your application's that are dependent on either a SQL Server database table or on an SQL query when using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]. 你还可用于此类指令一起协作来创建一个缓存输出的页或用户控件依赖于 SQL Server 数据库表。You can also use this class with the directive to make an output-cached page or a user control dependent on a SQL Server database table. 最后，你可以使用类页面指令的缓存输出的页依赖于 SQL 查询的结果时要使用[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]。Finally, you can use the class with the page directive to make an output-cached page dependent on the results of an SQL query when using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]. 查询通知使用[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]不支持用户控件的指令。Query notification using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] is not supported on the directive for user controls. > [!NOTE] > 此类才能正常工作时使用基于表的通知，数据库和任何你想要对依赖关系的表必须具有启用的通知。For this class to work correctly when using table-based notifications, the database and any tables that you want to make dependencies on must have notifications enabled. 你可以通过调用的方法来启用通知类或通过使用命令行工具。You can enable notifications by calling methods of the class or by using the command-line tool. 此外，必须在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中包含正确的配置设置。In addition, the proper configuration settings must be included in the application's Web.config file. > > 使用对象[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]查询通知不需要任何显式配置。Using a object with [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] query notification does not require any explicit configuration. 请查阅[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]有关使用查询通知时所允许的 TRANSACT-SQL 查询的类型限制信息联机丛书。Consult the [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] Books Online for information about restrictions on the types of Transact-SQL queries that are allowed when using query notification. 下面的示例演示启用基于表的 SQL Server 数据库表上的依赖关系的 ASP.NET Web.config 文件。The following example shows an ASP.NET Web.config file that enables table-based dependencies on a SQL Server database table. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用和控件以显示数据库表。The following code example uses the and controls to display a database table. 在页面加载页面后，尝试创建对象。When the page is loaded, the page attempts to create a object. 后创建对象、 页将项添加到`Cache`并依赖于对象。After the object is created, the page adds an item to the `Cache` with a dependency on the object. 应使用异常处理类似于此处所示。You should use exception handling similar to that shown here. [!code-aspx-csharp[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/CS/sqlcachedepsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/VB/sqlcachedepsamplevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并使用提供的 创建缓存键依赖项。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the supplied to create a cache-key dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于创建对象使用的查询通知功能[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]产品。This constructor is used to create objects that use the query-notification feature of [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] products. 与之关联的 SQL 语句`sqlCmd`参数必须包含以下：SQL statements that are associated with the `sqlCmd` parameter must include the following: - 完全限定表名，包括表所有者的名称。Fully qualified table names, including the name of the table owner. 例如，若要引用的表命名的 Customersthat 属于数据库所有者，SQL 语句必须引用`dbo.customers`。For example, to refer to a table named Customersthat is owned by the database owner, the SQL statement must refer to `dbo.customers`. - Select 语句中的显式列名称。Explicit column names in the Select statement. 星号 （\*） 通配符字符不能用于从表中选择所有列。You cannot use the asterisk (\*) wildcard character to select all columns from a table. 而不是，如`select * from dbo.customers`，必须使用`select name, address, city, state from dbo.customers`。For example, instead of `select * from dbo.customers`, you must use `select name, address, city, state from dbo.customers`. 此构造函数不能用于将关联实例与上的实例页使用[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]查询具有页级输出缓存功能的通知。This constructor cannot be used to associate a instance with a instance on a page using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] query notifications with page-level output caching.

span.span: The instance has its property set to and there is an directive on the page with the attribute set to CommandNotification.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并使用提供的参数创建缓存键依赖项。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the supplied parameters to create a cache-key dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于创建SQL Server 7.0 和 SQL Server 2000 产品的对象。This constructor is used to create objects for SQL Server 7.0 and SQL Server 2000 products. 数据库名称传递给`database`必须在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中定义参数。The database name passed to the `database` parameter must be defined in the application's Web.config file. 例如，下面的 Web.config 文件定义一个名为的 pubs 数据库更改通知。For example, the following Web.config file defines a database named pubs for change notifications. ``` ``` 使用此构造函数时，通常会引发两个例外：和。Two exceptions are commonly thrown when this constructor is used: and . 如果是引发，你可以调用在异常处理代码或使用命令行工具设置通知的数据库中的方法。If a is thrown, you can call the method in exception-handling code, or use the command-line tool to set up the database for notifications. 如果是引发，你可以调用方法或使用设置通知的表。If a is thrown, you can call the method or use to set up the table for notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数创建的实例都与名为 SQL Server 数据库中的类别的数据库表相关联的类名为 Northwind。The following code example uses this constructor to create an instance of the class that is associated with a database table named Categories in a SQL Server database named Northwind. [!code-csharp[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/CS/sqlcachedepsamplecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/VB/sqlcachedepsamplevb.aspx#2)]

Public Shared Function CreateOutputCacheDependency (dependency As String) As CacheDependency

span.span: The output-cache dependency directive.

summary.span: 创建 ASP.NET 应用程序的 对象中存储的项与 SQL Server 数据库表之间的依赖关系。

span.span: Creates a dependency relationship between an item that is stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a SQL Server database table.
The new dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下标记显示一个典型的输出缓存依赖项的指令。The following markup shows a typical output-cache dependency directive. ``` <%@ OutputCache Duration="3600" SqlDependency="Northwind:Employees" VaryByParam="none" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DependencyDispose() cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetUniqueID() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetUniqueID () As String

summary.span: 检索 对象的唯一标识符。

span.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.

returns.span: 如果有，则为 对象的唯一标识符；如果无法生成任何标识符，则为 Null。

span.span: The unique identifier for the object, or null if no identifier can be generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回用于唯一跟踪标识符与某个项或应用程序关联的对象。The method returns an identifier used to uniquely track objects associated with an item or application. 当使用基于表的通知时，生成的唯一标识符是部分依赖于由数据库生成的更改标识符。The unique identifier generated when using table-based notifications is partially dependent on the change identifier generated by the database. 使用基于 SQL Server 2005 的查询通知的唯一标识符时，`null`因为[!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]不支持返回单个查询通知的唯一标识符。When using SQL Server 2005-based query notifications, the unique identifier is `null` because [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] does not support returning unique identifiers for individual query notifications .
